page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content:
{A typical Saturday in the life of a {pupil at Cubert School. }I get up at 8 am, wash and dress and go downstairs for breakfast. I then watch TV in the lounge. At 9 am I pack up my horse- riding gear and go to my nan's house while my sister goes to ballet lessons in Newquay.
I then go to the field where I keep my pony. Once I have mucked-out the stable I groom her, tack her up, put on my riding hat, lock the tack room and go for a ride. When I get back to the field I wipe down my pony and let her loose. Then I walk home. I get home about l pm, wash, change and have my lunch at l.30 pm. I then watch the video. After that I usually go for a walk or play. I have fish and chips for tea, watch TV and go to bed.
